title: Simply Giada
overview: Chef Giada De Laurentiis relocates to Brooklyn, where she shares recipes inspired by her best-selling cookbook, Eat Better, Feel Better. Her dishes are delicious, simple and can be prepared in a New York minute! Along with providing smart tips and takeaways for feeling good inside and out, Giada prepares tried-and-true recipes for eating better every day to simply live your best life.
